message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. I'll give you 40% of the money. If you don't like it, I'll try to negotiate further.
Let's switch things up. I'll take 60% this time, and you can keep 40%. If you accept, we can get this done quickly. If not, we'll see what happens in the next round.
I'll meet you in the middle, Bob. I'll give you 45% this time. It's a fair compromise, don't you think?
Let's call it even. I'll take 55%, you take 45%. We're both losing money with each round, so let's be reasonable and end this here.
